mapper.select: SELECT id, spec_no, single_layers_length, single_layers_width, single_layers_height, layers_count, single_layer_support_weight, desc, img_url, inner_org_id FROM shelves_spec where id = #{id}
SELECT id, spec_no, single_layers_length, single_layers_width, single_layers_height, layers_count, single_layer_support_weight, desc, img_url, inner_org_id FROM shelves_spec where 1 = 1
